description.value:
You draw an occluding veil of spirits around yourself, blocking yourself especially well from undead eyes. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to all creatures, and you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} from undead creatures regardless of what precise senses they have; this grants the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility}, but against all the undead creature's precise senses. If you physically @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} with an undead creature or use a hostile action, the spell ends.

Heightened (+1) You can target one additional willing creature within 30 feet. The spell ends if any target physically Interacts with an undead creature or uses a hostile action.
